backlinks.section2Description: To do SEO well in Hong Kong, Chinese backlinks are essential. We developed a Chinese backlinks system, welcoming clients and peers to purchase.
backlinks.section3Title: Backlink is one of Google's top 3 ranking factors
backlinks.section4TopTitle: Before buying backlinks, let's clarify the facts first...
backlinks.section4BottomTitle: "Buying backlinks - Native4a Backlink HK's Chinese backlinks are different"
backlinks.johnMuellerQuote: Google Search Advocate John Mueller publicly stated in a YouTube Google Webmaster Central office hours video chat:
backlinks.johnMuellerText: "Sometimes links on a page can improve page quality, but I think that's an artificial factor you don't want to see. Just because there are links on a page doesn't mean it's necessarily good."
backlinks.section5Title: Backlinks (backlink) in SEO represent a link relationship between websites...
backlinks.section5Description: In other words, when one website links to another, the former is an external link to the latter. Backlinks are considered one of the important factors in search engine ranking, so buying Chinese backlinks can be an indicator of website authority and trust. It can influence search engine ranking algorithms, allowing websites to gain more traffic and improve search engine rankings, thereby obtaining more orders and profits

smmAds.title: Want to run FB/IG ads?
smmAds.subtitle: FB&IG [Ad Planning + Management] Services
smmAds.description: Poor ad performance, frequent bans, can't spend budget, don't know how to create ad graphics. High ad costs - all problems can be solved *today*.
smmAds.adStrategy: Complete Ad Strategy (Traffic + Conversion Ad Combos)
smmAds.adStrategyDesc1: Different content attracts customers at different stages. Some ads focus on traffic generation, using fun and engaging
smmAds.adStrategyDesc2: For customers who have interacted before (liked or viewed your Profile), you can use
smmAds.adStrategyDesc3: For customers who have inquired or viewed products, use
smmAds.adStrategyDesc3End: to track them and offer deals to close sales.
smmAds.adStrategyConclusion: So FB/IG ads serve different roles
smmAds.adDesignDesc: Package your products or services in the most viral ad formats.
smmAds.adDesignDesc2: Whether professional or casual fun style, we can do it all.
smmAds.adDesignDesc3: Scroll down to see past works
smmAds.adSettingDesc: Bidding strategy, audience targeting, placement settings - maximize inquiries within budget.
smmAds.adMonitorDesc: Ad data changes constantly and needs constant monitoring. You can even check competitor ads.
smmAds.nativeDiffDesc: One-stop concept, design, and data analytics advertising service.
smmAds.nativeDiffParagraph: Unlike other Google advertising companies, NATIVE doesn't just set up ads for you. We provide everything from concept, design, keyword data analysis, to ad setup - all in one service.

seo.metaDescription: native4a Hong Kong SEO company, stand on the shoulders of giants
seo.title: native4a - Hong Kong SEO Company
seo.subtitle: Stand on the Shoulders of Giants
seo.whatCanBuy: What exactly can you get from an SEO company?
seo.whatCanBuyDesc: A leading Hong Kong SEO company with proprietary Traditional Chinese backlink system, effectively improving Chinese website rankings
seo.freeExposureDesc: Many say SEO is the trend, but what's the actual state after doing SEO well? What direct benefits does it bring to clients?
seo.freeExposureNote: The above case only extracted 15 sets of keywords as examples. Average SEM ad spend is HK$11.09*3757 clicks = saving HK$41,665/month
seo.freeExposureNote2: In other words, when your SEO is solid, your website's customer acquisition will reach levels that SEM ads cannot achieve.
seo.keywordRankingDesc: As the SEO company works, search engines will trust your website more, improving your rankings. Since SEO optimizes the entire website, you'll see improvements beyond just target keywords - many surprise 'traffic codes' will emerge.
seo.brandReputationDesc: A Think With Google study found that consumers conduct up to 32 searches before purchasing a product. Once consumers enter your keyword domain and see your website ranking high across multiple keywords, it elevates your brand image.
seo.idealState: The above is the ideal state of SEO,
seo.idealStateList: 1. Save massive SEM spending 2. High rankings 3. High traffic 4. High brand value 5. Continuous expansion
seo.idealStateConclusion: This is what a competent SEO company will bring you.
seo.nativeIntro: Native, as a leading Hong Kong SEO company, has been operating for nearly 7 years, accumulating extensive experience and experimental results in SEO.
seo.nativeExperience: Has optimized many highly competitive fields, including: tutoring, medical supplies, moving companies and other high-competition industries. Visit our IG for detailed cases
seo.howWeDoSeo: How do we actually do SEO for clients?
seo.keywordResearchDesc: Before starting SEO, we research keywords from the client's website, industry, competitors and other data.
seo.keywordResearchSteps: 1a. Find keyword data 1b. Analyze competitors 1c. Link Profile analysis
seo.onPageDesc: We first optimize your website technically to improve its search result rankings. This may include improving website speed, making it mobile-friendly, and optimizing content to include keywords.
seo.onPageSteps: 2a. Website speed improvement 2b. Mobile compatibility 2c. Keyword density check
seo.contentOptimizationDesc: We provide suitable SEO content creation guidelines, optimizing content based on keyword direction. This content goes on your website, so both the SEO company and you need to participate and discuss.
seo.contentOptimizationSteps: 3a. SEO content guidelines, even basic drafts 3b. SEO article structure guidelines 3c. h1-h6 heading design
seo.backlinkBuildingDesc: Backlinks are a crucial part of SEO. Even if your content is perfect, without backlink support, you won't achieve good rankings for popular keywords.
seo.disclaimer: (Cases vary, the above data is for reference only, not guaranteed.)
